nodes.text: Triple Cross is a mini-adventure published in the Supernova supplement for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was written by Steven H. Lorenz.

During the general chaos on Demophon preceding its destruction via supernova, the opportunity to make easy money ferrying people out is irresistible to virtually anyone with a starship. Andus Urshant offers the characters 50,000 credits to ferry his family from the city of D'larah to another system. What should be a simple mission, however, swiftly becomes far more complicated.
